text: Have you ever wanted to change your main navigation links to match the content staging domain so you can navigate a site being rebranded? I couldn't find a way to do it using staging tool so I used some jquery to check if it was a sandbox and update the links. You can grab the code here if you want to try it <https://bootstrapcreative.com/how-to-update-navigation-menu-in-HubSpot-content-staging/>

Hi, I have a webhook in which I configure a subscription to a change in the value of the property "recent_conversion_event_name", but it does not work, the rest of the properties used in the same webhook do work for me

I am sorry if I am in the wrong spot.. I have looked everywhere for something that seems like it should be so simple. How do I get this to work?Â  I just want to grab a value from a HubSpot form field. This is NOT an embedded form.. its right in HS and I am adding to my main js file

var industry = $( "input[name*='application']" ).val();
